title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Monday, September 4 (game #588)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: Mortal Kombat 1's 5-day early access period for Premium Edition players has been officially confirmed
description: Premium Edition purchasers get five extra days to get in some practice before the game formally releases on September 19.

title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 is coming in late 2024 - and a new studio is leading development
description: The Chinese Room confirms it has assumed development of the highly-anticipated sequel that's been languishing in development hell.

title: Pixel Buds Pro rumored to be getting two new colors to match the Pixel 8
description: Besides new phones and a new watch, we might also see two new colors for the Pixel Buds Pro next month.

title: Samsung's latest Pro memory cards can take your creativity to the next level
description: Affordable microSD and SD cards from Samsung offer the best read/write speeds for the most demanding creators.

title: The latest Google Maps redesign makes it look a lot more like Apple Maps
description: Some users are seeing a visual refresh for Google Maps that closely resembles a rival mapping app.
